name: NODES (Certifiably Unqualified)
description:
NODES Overview

Nodes is a project made from scratch by the team at Certifiably Unqualified for the GMTK Game Jam contest, 2021. Nodes integrates the theme of "Join Together" through the concept of a triple pendulum connected through 'joints' which you aim to protect. As the joints are hit, they separate, ending the level when you lose all joints.

Introduction

You are a network of organisms escaping a laboratory and you need to survive waves of drone attacks. 

Swing around like a pendulum to destroy drones but be careful to protect your weak points: the connecting nodes. If a drone hits you at the joints, you will lose lengths of organisms and lose. 

Controls

Use 1, 2, 3, 4 keys to attach/detach respective nodes.

Use SpaceBar to give a kick to the end of the pendulum.

Node order begins from the right, indicated by the gradually weakening connections.

Disclaimer:

WebGL build does not support post-processing & lighting. For optimal gameplay, download .zip file that you can support.
